Name: Celestial Seraph
Story Background: Revered among the heavens, the Celestial Seraph is a divine manifestation of purity and grace, an avenger of the oppressed and a guardian of the virtuous, its presence radiating unyielding hope and celestial protection.
Ability: Flying, Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life), Whenever Celestial Seraph attacks, you may exile random nonland permanent an opponent controls until Celestial Seraph leaves the battlefield.
Appearance Description: The Celestial Seraph is a resplendent, winged figure adorned in luminous, flowing robes that trail like wisps of stardust. Its eyes shine with boundless compassion, and its golden wings span wide, casting a radiant halo of light that banishes darkness and despair.
